General_Description: '''From the Heart''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note left on the [[message board]], and decided to look into it.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a message board. *'''Note:'''
''From [[Zeus]], the [[Cattle|bull]] [[Europa (mythology)|Europa]] kissed. He offered a [[Spear of Kephalos|javelin]] that never missed.'' She sought out the Athenian soldier and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''My commander is in love with a priestess of [[Hekate|Hecate]].'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What's wrong with that?'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''She asked him for a letter expressing his eternal devotion written in his blood.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And he gave it to her?'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''Love turns people into idiots. I just know she's going to do something evil with that letter.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to deal with her.'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''I knew I asked the right person.'' (Accept - I'm going to help you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can count on me.'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''Thank you. Please be quick.'' *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. Kassandra sought out the priestess and killed her, then returned to the soldier. *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''You. Have you killed her?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''She's no longer your concern.'' *'''Athenian Soldier:''' ''Well done, my friend. You've earned your keep, that's for sure. Please, accept this as thanks.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the spy deal with a priestess, and was rewarded for this.
